00023 #ifndef TLM_PUT_GET_IMP_HEADER
00024 #define TLM_PUT_GET_IMP_HEADER
00025 
00026 #include "tlm_h/tlm_core/tlm_interfaces/tlm_master_slave_ifs.h"
00027 
00028 template < typename PUT_DATA , typename GET_DATA>
00029 class tlm_put_get_imp :
00030   private virtual tlm_put_if< PUT_DATA > ,
00031   private virtual tlm_get_peek_if< GET_DATA >
00032 {
00033 public:
00034   tlm_put_get_imp( tlm_put_if<PUT_DATA> &p ,
00035                    tlm_get_peek_if<GET_DATA> &g ) :
00036     put_fifo( p ) , get_fifo( g ) {}
00037 
00038   // put interface
00039 
00040   void put( const PUT_DATA &t ) { put_fifo.put( t ); }
00041 
00042   bool nb_put( const PUT_DATA &t ) { return put_fifo.nb_put( t ); }
00043   bool nb_can_put( tlm_tag<PUT_DATA> *t = 0 ) const {
00044     return put_fifo.nb_can_put( t );
00045   }
00046   const sc_event &ok_to_put( tlm_tag<PUT_DATA> *t = 0 ) const {
00047     return put_fifo.ok_to_put( t );
00048   }
00049 
00050   // get interface
00051 
00052   GET_DATA get( tlm_tag<GET_DATA> *t = 0 ) { return get_fifo.get(); }
00053 
00054   bool nb_get( GET_DATA &t ) { return get_fifo.nb_get( t ); }
00055   
00056   bool nb_can_get( tlm_tag<GET_DATA> *t = 0 ) const {
00057     return get_fifo.nb_can_get( t );
00058   }
00059 
00060   virtual const sc_event &ok_to_get( tlm_tag<GET_DATA> *t = 0 ) const {
00061     return get_fifo.ok_to_get( t );
00062   }
00063 
00064   // peek interface
00065 
00066   GET_DATA peek( tlm_tag<GET_DATA> *t = 0 ) const { return get_fifo.peek(); }
00067 
00068   bool nb_peek( GET_DATA &t ) const { return get_fifo.nb_peek( t ); }
00069   
00070   bool nb_can_peek( tlm_tag<GET_DATA> *t = 0 ) const {
00071     return get_fifo.nb_can_peek( t );
00072   }
00073 
00074   virtual const sc_event &ok_to_peek( tlm_tag<GET_DATA> *t = 0 ) const {
00075     return get_fifo.ok_to_peek( t );
00076   }
00077 
00078 private:
00079   tlm_put_if<PUT_DATA> &put_fifo;
00080   tlm_get_peek_if<GET_DATA> &get_fifo;
00081 };
00082 
00083 template < typename REQ , typename RSP >
00084 class tlm_master_imp :
00085   private tlm_put_get_imp< REQ , RSP > ,
00086   public virtual tlm_master_if< REQ , RSP >
00087 {
00088 public:
00089 
00090   tlm_master_imp( tlm_put_if<REQ> &req ,
00091                   tlm_get_peek_if<RSP> &rsp ) :
00092     tlm_put_get_imp<REQ,RSP>( req , rsp ) {}
00093 
00094 };
00095 
00096 template < typename REQ , typename RSP >
00097 class tlm_slave_imp :
00098   private tlm_put_get_imp< RSP , REQ > ,
00099   public virtual tlm_slave_if< REQ , RSP >
00100 {
00101 public:
00102 
00103   tlm_slave_imp( tlm_get_peek_if<REQ> &req ,
00104                  tlm_put_if<RSP> &rsp ) :
00105     tlm_put_get_imp<RSP,REQ>( rsp  , req ) {}
00106 
00107 };
